snippet.title: Forgotten Hope Showcase Trailer - Sri Lankan Indie Game 2021
snippet.description:
Here's your first official overview into Forgotten Hope's game world and the places you'd be visiting along your journey to recover your memories. 

Forgotten Hope release on 12th May 2021.  
Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/2Q7kMS5"
